content.text:
# Renaissance Park

#REDIRECT Charlotte, North Carolina
A page with this name was previously deleted giving the reason that "it is a housing subdivision or something."  It may be true that such a commercial entity with this name does exist.  But this article really is about a [http://charmeck.org/mecklenburg/county/ParkandRec/Parks/ParksByRegion/SouthRegion/Pages/RenaissancePK.aspx Mecklenburg County Park].
;NOTICE
* Please do not move or rename the page Renaissance Park (Charlotte, North Carolina) with the reason, "no need for disambiguation".
* It is true that this particular Charlotte park name is currently unambiguous.  But many Charlotte park names are ambiguous, and this one may become so.  Also there is a carefully worked out naming convention for all of the :Category:Parks in Charlotte, North Carolina.  Avoid future ambiguity problems and leave it as is.
